title: ICT Integration Strategies in Higher Education: Enhancing Learner Competencies in Science Disciplines

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience in utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: Students require experiences in ICT-enabled collaboration and creative problem-solving in science, with a demand for instructors' effective ICT integration examples

learning_goals: Learners acquire skills in visualizing and analyzing scientific data using various ICT tools.
Learners conduct project-based learning (PBL) with peers using online collaboration tools.
In a self-directed learning environment, learners develop and apply ICT-based creativity evaluation criteria.

resources: BYOD-compatible Software (e.g., Virtual Labs, Collaboration Tools)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
